key.name: panel-position
key.summary: Box where the indicator will be inserted
key.description: Box where the indicator will be inserted (left, center or right).

key.name: position
key.description: Position where the indicator will be inserted (0 = first, 1 = second, ...).

key.name: icons-limit
key.summary: Maximum number of icons per workspace (0 = unlimited)
key.description: Maximum number of icons displayed in a single workspace indicator.

key.name: show-focused-app-indicator
key.description: Show focused app indicator with an indicator above it.

key.name: show-active-workspace-indicator
key.description: Show active workspace indicator with an indicator below it.

key.name: reduce-inactive-apps-opacity
key.description: Reduce opacity of application not currently focused.

key.name: round-indicators-border
key.description: Apply a round effect to the "show focused app" and "show active workspace" indicator.

key.name: show-workspace-index
key.description: Adds the workspace index before the icons.

key.name: scroll-wraparound
key.description: Scrolling after the last workspace wraps around to first workspace (and viceversa).

key.name: hide-empty-workspaces
key.description: Removes the indicator of empty workspaces.

key.name: apps-on-all-workspaces-indicator
key.summary: Apps on all workspaces indicator displayed name
key.description: Name displayed for the indicator of apps on all workspaces (second monitor).
